divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from work and pulling into my neighborhood around o'connor and 1604 (suburbs in north san antonio) at about 9:20pm, i saw two white bright lights flying slowly ahead, they appeared to be a a relatively low altitude, as it flew closer and over my car a third bright white light turned on in the front of the craft revealing a triangular shape, as it passed overhead i could clearly make out the shape against the sky that was lit up from san antonio city lights and i clearly saw the black triangular shape, it might had have some very dim lights in the center but not nearly as bright, it made no noise and i stared at it until it disappeared over the treeline still moving fairly slow going west\southwest. did anyone else see this!?
Summary: two white lights, as it flew overhead a third light lit up and revealed a triangular shape
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There were no other sightings in San Antonio on or around November 15th 2010
